title: headwear...
body:
So, as most of u may know, I am a hot gamer grill and for a long time i've worn beanies in the winter to keep my head and ears warm. 
Recently however i have transitioned into using a rimmed hat with a hoodie, i keep donkin the rim on things and im getting a major case of whiplash. Ples help.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: OK SO WHAT YOU WONT TO DO IS GO TO A BOARD THAT IS MADE FOR HEAD WEAR AND NOT LEAGUE OF LEGENDS
well this is Miscellaneous my friend.
well this is not for hats is it or how about we get some other game players over here dota cod ect yes no its miscellaneous
No rule against that, go right ahead :) . Or better yet be quiet and not post at all, waste of space.
waste of space like your post

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ushanka

Get a Ushanka, or a Canadian beaver fur hat. something like this.
http://i00.i.aliimg.com/wsphoto/v0/32252096578_1/NEW-Black-Canadian-Beaver-Fur-Hat-PU-Lerther-Warm-Ushanka-trapper-style-Men-s.jpg_350x350.jpg
I think you didn't read the part where I said i am a hot grill. Ew, no way i would ever wear that.

http://www.ushanka.com/images/products/lamb_black_ushanka_l.jpg

Guarantee you don't look this hot.

> [{quoted}](name=Danklight Vayne,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uJxA7EF7,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-10-23T01:19:07.213+0000)
>
> I am a hot gamer grill

pics or it didnt happen
how about u just use a hoodie or beanie again
I'm not about the beanie life anymore ): soz.
1 TH1NK A11 B34N13S R K3WL XDDDDDD
